name: Glass Bridge
description:
Background

Several people, struggling with their lives, took part in the life-and-death game for a $30 million prize.

Features

It's a Roguelike survival strategy game that relies on chance to pick the right glass and strategy to use skills.

The bridge is made up of 18 pairs of glass, each containing a piece of ordinary glass and a piece of reinforced glass. The reinforced glass can bear the weight of multiple people, while the ordinary glass cannot bear the weight of a single person.
Walk across the bridge, reach your destination and win.
Select a contestant and click Prepare.
Click on the glass in front of the contestant and jump forward.
If you jump on ordinary glass, the glass will break and the contestant will fall.
Pick another contestant and get ready to jump.
A skill point is awarded for each correct choice of a reinforced glass. Players can unlock a contestant's abilities.
Finally reach the opposite platform, the victory.
If there are no contestants left and the finish line has not been reached, the game fails.

Terrorist

The terror of survival, especially when falling can be felt more.

Real

Close-up of movie footage, the game has better authenticity and enjoyment.
